mapper.select: SELECT A.RSRV_SEQ, A.RSRV_DATE, C.CAFE_NAME, B.TOTAL_PRICE FROM RSRV A, PAY B, CAFE C WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND C.CAFE_NUM = A.CAFE_NUM AND A.RSRV_SEQ = B.RSRV_SEQ ORDER BY A.RSRV_SEQ DESC

SELECT A.RSRV_SEQ AS RSRV_SEQ, TO_CHAR(B.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PAY_DATE, A.RSRV_SEAT_LIST AS RSRV_SEAT_LIST, C.CAFE_NAME AS CAFE_NAME, A.RSRV_TIME AS RSRV_TIME, B.ORIGIN_PRICE AS ORIGIN_PRICE, B.TOTAL_PRICE AS TOTAL_PRICE, B.PAY_POINT AS PAY_POINT, B.PAY_STEP AS PAY_STEP FROM RSRV A, PAY B, CAFE C WHERE A.RSRV_SEQ = #{value} AND A.RSRV_SEQ = B.RSRV_SEQ AND A.CAFE_NUM = C.CAFE_NUM

SELECT BBS_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, REG_DATE, BBS_PUBLIC, ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, BBS_TITLE, REG_DATE, BBS_PUBLIC, ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM (SELECT NVL(A.BBS_SEQ, 0) AS BBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_PUBLIC, '') AS BBS_PUBLIC, NVL(A.ADMIN_PUBLIC, '') AS ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM COMMUNITY A, TBL_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID ORDER BY BBS_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(A.BBS_SEQ) FROM COMMUNITY A, TBL_USER B WHERE B.USER_ID = #{value} AND B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID

SELECT RSRV_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, BBS_PUBLIC, ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RSRV_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, REG_DATE, BBS_PUBLIC, ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM (SELECT NVL(A.RSRV_SEQ, 0) AS RSRV_SEQ, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_PUBLIC, '') AS BBS_PUBLIC, NVL(A.ADMIN_PUBLIC, '') AS ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM REVIEW A, TBL_USER B, RSRV C WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.RSRV_SEQ = C.RSRV_SEQ ORDER BY RSRV_SEQ DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(A.RSRV_SEQ) FROM REVIEW A, TBL_USER B, RSRV C WHERE B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.RSRV_SEQ = C.RSRV_SEQ

SELECT NVL(A.BBS_SEQ, 0) AS BBS_SEQ, NVL(A.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_PUBLIC, '') AS BBS_PUBLIC, NVL(A.ADMIN_PUBLIC, '') AS ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM COMMUNITY A, TBL_USER B WHERE BBS_SEQ = #{value} AND B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID

SELECT NVL(A.RSRV_SEQ, 0) AS RSRV_SEQ, NVL(B.USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_PUBLIC, '') AS BBS_PUBLIC, NVL(A.ADMIN_PUBLIC, '') AS ADMIN_PUBLIC FROM REVIEW A, TBL_USER B, RSRV C WHERE A.RSRV_SEQ = #{userId} AND B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.RSRV_SEQ = C.RSRV_SEQ
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RSRV WHERE CAFE_NUM = ( SELECT CAFE_NUM FROM CAFE WHERE USER_ID = #{value}) ORDER BY RSRV_DATE DESC, RSRV_TIME DESC

SELECT RSRV_SEQ, USER_ID, RSRV_DATE, RSRV_TIME, RSRV_PPL_CNT, CAFE_NUM, RSRV_SEAT_LIST FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, RSRV_SEQ, USER_ID, RSRV_DATE, RSRV_TIME, RSRV_PPL_CNT, CAFE_NUM, RSRV_SEAT_LIST FROM ( SELECT NVL(RSRV_SEQ, 0) AS RSRV_SEQ, NVL(USER_ID, '') AS USER_ID, NVL(TO_CHAR(RSRV_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') AS RSRV_DATE, NVL(RSRV_TIME, '') AS RSRV_TIME, NVL(RSRV_PPL_CNT, 0) AS RSRV_PPL_CNT, NVL(CAFE_NUM, '') AS CAFE_NUM, NVL(RSRV_SEAT_LIST, '') AS RSRV_SEAT_LIST FROM RSRV WHERE CAFE_NUM = ( SELECT CAFE_NUM FROM CAFE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) ORDER BY RSRV_DATE DESC, RSRV_TIME DESC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT CAFE_NUM, USER_ID, AREA_NUM, SUBAREA_NUM, CAFE_NAME, CAFE_CONTENT, CAFE_ADDR, CAFE_OPN_HRS, CAFE_CLS_HRS, STATUS, CAFE_KEYWORD FROM CAFE WHERE USER_ID = #{value}
